about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm Roland, a proactive and curious developer from Satu Mare, Romania, with a strong passion for technology and continuous learning.
about.paragraph2: My technical journey began with a comprehensive computer science degree from Sapientia Hungarian University of Transylvania, where I gained deep expertise in programming languages like Java, C, C++, and Kotlin, as well as advanced topics like digital signal processing and image processing.
about.paragraph3: Beyond traditional software development, I'm fascinated by emerging technologies including AI and robotics.
about.paragraph4: When I'm not coding, you'll find me staying active at the gym, exploring new technologies, or working on hands-on DIY electronics projects. I'm always eager to collaborate with talented teams and contribute to meaningful projects that make a real impact.
